item.title: Creating new Hugo blog posts
item.description: How I create new blog posts Link to heading So, this is in a way a “meta” article about how I create new blog posts. It’s me mostly being kind to my future self by documenting how to create a new blog post. The command to create the post Link to heading The command to create the new post is: hugo new content/posts/[NAME_OF_FILE_HERE].md # e.g. hugo new content/posts/friday-2nd-august-2024.md from the help description it works by being able to guess the content “kind” based on the path:
